title.narrative: Advisory services for more effective social assistance in crises

description.narrative: This activity (Advisory services for more effective social assistance in crises) is a component of Better Assistance in Crises (Social Protection) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,687,950. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Social Protection. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-08-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2024.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
